keyword: how many calories in a mandarin
title: How Many Calories in a Mandarin?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a mandarin, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per fruit.
h1: How Many Calories in a Mandarin?
assumptions: Medium-sized fresh mandarin orange (~75 g edible portion), peeled, no added sugar or preservatives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, variety, ripeness, and growing conditions. Check labels for packaged versions.

quick_answer.text: One medium mandarin has about 47 kcal and 1.8 g fiber.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a medium mandarin?
faqs.a: About 47 kcal for one medium mandarin orange.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a mandarin?
faqs.a: Roughly 12 g total carbs, including 1.8 g fiber and 10 g sugars.
Yes, only 0.3 g fat per mandarin, with no saturated or trans fats.

faqs.q: How much vitamin C in a mandarin?
faqs.a: One mandarin provides about 26 mg vitamin C, or ~30% daily value.
Minimal, around 0.7 g protein per fruit; they're mostly carbs from natural sugars.
